description: Travel day from Osaka to Fukuoka - settle into accommodation and first evening exploration

activities.name: Evening arrival in Fukuoka
activities.description: Arrive in Fukuoka and check into Hakata Base accommodation. Take a brief evening stroll around the Hakata area to get oriented.

reservations.name: Hakata Base The Passage 2号
reservations.description: Private accommodation in Hakata Ward, Fukuoka hosted by Naoki - great location for Fukuoka exploration, check-in 4:00 PM December 4th

meals: Lunch: On travel route, Dinner: Local Hakata ramen
notes: Travel day to Fukuoka. Hakata ward is the central district with excellent food scene and historic sites.
